item.title: 多线程
item.description: CreateThread 1 m_AcountManageThread = CreateThread(NULL, NULL, ThreadProc, this, 0, NULL);//创建线程 AfxBeginThread (MFC专用) 1 2 //创建线程 大漠的DMInitThread AfxBeginThread(DMInitThread, this, THREAD_PRIORITY_NORMAL, 0, 0, NULL); _beginthreadex 1 m_hThreadHandle = (HANDLE)::_beginthreadex(NULL, 0, ThreadFunction, this, 0, &m_uThreadID); //
